Name: Midnight's Curse
About the game: Play an exciting retro RPG in the vein of Ashes of Immortality and Black Home, featuring legendary horror myths. STORY: Join Luna together with Rez the Werewolf, Frankie the Frankenstein and Mary the Hunter against her former partner Dracula, who is set out to enslave humankind in act of revenge by calling upon the Blood Moon, his most evil ritual. Play a unique tale with legendary heroes and many twists and turns! FEATURES: Play with a very unique party! Explore special dungeons! Enjoy 10-15 hours of gameplay! Exciting and amusing storyline and party interaction! PLAY ALSO:
